com.tle.beans.entity.LanguageString.text: Replicate the bug: 1. Tail the resource centre log 2. Contribute as cppdm/tle010 - fill in all of the controls. 3. Logout, log back in as csme. Edit the item you've saved. The logs will show all of the metadata. Click on the single control. All metadata disappears.
Totally unrelated switch that reloads the page
